args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let (x_n) be a convergent real sequence and define y_n := max (x_n) 0.
    Then lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} y_n ‚â• 0. -/
theorem lim_max_nonneg_of_tendsto {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {L : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù L)) :
  Tendsto (fun n => max (x n) 0) atTop (ùìù (max L 0)) ‚àß 0 ‚â§ max L 0 := by sorry
